body_html:
Thank you Jian. We're conservative about the interface of canned estimators. For every feature/argument we need an analysis of how it impacts training. in which conditions it works better.
For batchnorm, we recommend people to create their own model_fn by copying existing canned estimators model_fns.
I'm closing this. Please re-open it if you feel otherwise.
Thanks again.

body:
Thank you Jian. We're conservative about the interface of canned estimators. For every feature/argument we need an analysis of how it impacts training. in which conditions it works better. 
For batchnorm, we recommend people to create their own model_fn by copying existing canned estimators model_fns. 
I'm closing this. Please re-open it if you feel otherwise.
Thanks again.
